title: Sweet 'n' Spicy BBQ Sauce
ingredients: ['325g dark brown soft sugar', '375g tomato ketchup', '125ml red wine vinegar', '125ml water', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 1/2 tablespoons mustard powder', '2 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons black pepper', '2 dashes hot pepper sauce']
